Strings.<b><color=magenta>Note </color></b><b><c: Note ToyBox was designed to offer the best user experience at widths of 1920 or higher. Please consider increasing your resolution up of at least 1920x1080 (ideally 4k) and go to Unity Mod Manager 'Settings' tab to change the mod window width to at least 1920. Increasing the UI scale is nice too when running at 4k
Strings.<b><color=magenta>Warning: </color></b><: Warning: This is an experimental preview of ToyBox (Sh0dan) for Rogue Trader Beta. Save early and often. Note: Not all features are functional at this time. The ToyBox team is working hard to get as much working as fast as possible
Strings.<b><color=orange>character(s) can be </c: character(s) can be Recruited. This allows you to add non party NPCs to your party as if they were mercenaries
Strings.<b><color=orange>Note</color></b><color=: Note this is a new and exciting feature that allows you to see for the first time the structure and some basic relationships of Etudes and other Elements that control the progression of your game story. Etudes are hierarchical in structure and additionally contain a set of Elements that can both conditions to check and actions to execute when the etude is started. As you browe you will notice there is a disclosure triangle next to the name which will show the children of the Etude. Etudes that have Elements will offer a second disclosure triangle next to the status that will show them to you.
Strings.<b><color=yellow>BACK UP</color></b><col: BACK UP before playing with this feature.You will lose your mythic ranks but you can restore them in this Party Editor.
Strings.<b><color=yellow>WARNING</color></b><col: WARNING these features are EXPERIMENTAL and uses unreleased and likely buggy code.
WARNING this tool can both miraculously fix your broken progression or it can break it even further. Save and back up your save before using.
Strings.<color=#00ff00ff>Some responses such as: Some responses such as comments about your mythic powers will always choose the first one by default. This allows the game to mix things up a bit Warning: this will introduce randomness to NPC responses to you in general and may lead to surprising or even wild outcomes
Strings.<color=#00ff00ff>Tells the game to reset: <color=#00ff00ff>Tells the game to reset the in game UI.</color><color=yellow> Warning</color><color=orange> Using this in dialog or the book will dismiss that dialog which may break progress so use with care</color>
Strings.<color=#00ff00ff>This allows you to loot: This allows you to loot items that are locked such as items carried by certain NPCs and items locked on your characters WARNING: This may affect story progression (e.g. your purple knife)
Strings.<color=#00ff00ff>This makes loot functio: <color=#00ff00ff>This makes loot function like Diablo or Borderlands. <color=orange>Note: turning this off requires you to save and reload for it to take effect.</color></color>
Strings.<color=cyan> + Click</color> To Use Item: <color=cyan> + Click</color> To Use Items In Inventory
Strings.<color=orange>Experimental</color> Allow: <color=orange>Experimental</color> Allow remote companions to make comments on dialog you are having.
Strings.<color=orange>Note:</color><color=#00ff0: <color=orange>Note:</color><color=#00ff00ff> For cutscenes and some situations the rotation keys are disabled so you have to hold down Mouse3 to drag in order to get rotation</color>
Strings.Achievements not available until you loa: Achievements not available until you load a save.
Strings.Adds a search field to Load/Save screen: Adds a search field to Load/Save screen (in game only)
Strings.Adjust Profit Factor by the following am: Adjust Profit Factor by the following amount:
Strings.Adjust Reputation by the following amoun: Adjust Reputation by the following amount:
Strings.Adjust Resource Factor by the following: Adjust Resource Factor by the following amount:
Strings.Adjust Scrap by the following amount:: Adjust Scrap by the following amount:
Strings.Adjusts costs of hiring mercenaries at t: Adjusts costs of hiring mercenaries at the Pathfinder vendor
Strings.Adjusts the movement speed of your party: Adjusts the movement speed of your party in area maps
Adjusts the movement speed of your party on world maps
Strings.Allow Item Use From Inventory During Com: Allow Item Use From Inventory During Combat
Strings.Allow Mass Loot to steal from living NPC: Allow Mass Loot to steal from living NPCs
Strings.Auto Follow While Holding Camera Follow: Auto Follow While Holding Camera Follow Key
Strings.Auto load Last Save on launch: Auto load Last Save on launch
Strings.Bindable hot key to swap between main an: Bindable hot key to swap between main and alternate time scale multipliers
Strings.Change the party without advancing time: Change the party without advancing time (good to bind)
Strings.Changing your gender may cause visual gl: Changing your gender may cause visual glitches
Strings.Click On Equip Slots To Filter Inventory: Click On Equip Slots To Filter Inventory
Strings.Ctrl + Mouse3 Drag To Adjust Camera Elev: Ctrl + Mouse3 Drag To Adjust Camera Elevation
Strings.Display guids in most tooltips, use shif: Display guids in most tooltips, use shift + left click on items/abilities to copy guid to clipboard
Strings.Don't wait for keypress when loading sav: Don't wait for keypress when loading saves
Strings.Draws dialog choices that you have previ: Draws dialog choices that you have previously selected in smaller type
Strings.Enable Mouse3 Dragging To Aim The Camera: Enable Mouse3 Dragging To Aim The Camera
Strings.Enable Rotate on all maps and cutscenes: Enable Rotate on all maps and cutscenes
Strings.Enable Zoom on all maps and cutscenes: Enable Zoom on all maps and cutscenes
Strings.Enterint a Trap Zone while having Traps: Enterint a Trap Zone while having Traps disabled will prevent that Trap from triggering even if you deactivate this option in the future
Strings.Exceptions to Buff Duration Multiplier (: Exceptions to Buff Duration Multiplier (Advanced; will cause blueprints to load)
Strings.Expand Dialog To Include Remote Companio: Expand Dialog To Include Remote Companions
Strings.Failure to load saves that reference cus: Failure to load saves that reference custom portraits
Strings.good for larger group or to reduce enemi: good for larger group or to reduce enemies
Strings.Head: Head
Strings.Hold down shift during launch to bypass: Hold down shift during launch to bypass
Strings.If ticked, this will <b><color=#C04040E0: If ticked, this will MURDER all who dare to engage you!
Strings.If you have a save that uses custom port: If you have a save that uses custom portraits and don't toggle this your game will crash when starting
Strings.If you tick this you can click on equipm: If you tick this you can click on equipment slots to filter the inventory for items that fit in it. For more Enhanced Inventory and Spellbook check out the Loot & Spellbook Tab
Strings.Ignore Ability Requirement - Line of Sig: Ignore Ability Requirement - Line of Sight
Strings.Import/Export allows you to save and add: Import/Export allows you to save and add a list of items to a file based on the type (e.g. Weapon.json). These files live in a new ToyBox folder that in the same folder that contains your saved games
Strings.Interesting NPCs in the local area: Interesting NPCs in the local area
Strings.Lets you open up the area's mass loot sc: Lets you open up the area's mass loot screen to grab goodies whenever you want. Normally shown only when you exit the area
Strings.Log ToyBox Keyboard Commands In Game: Log ToyBox Keyboard Commands In Game
Strings.Make game continue to play music on lost: Make game continue to play music on lost focus
Strings.Make tutorials not appear if disabled in: Make tutorials not appear if disabled in settings
Strings.Makes mouse zoom work for the local map: Makes mouse zoom work for the local map (cities, dungeons, etc). Game restart required if you turn it off
Strings.Maximize the ModManager window for best: Maximize the ModManager window for best ToyBox user experience
Strings.Minimum Rarity For Loot Rarity Tags/Colo: Minimum Rarity For Loot Rarity Tags/Colors
Strings.Name of the new Custom Portrait:: Name of the new Custom Portrait:
Strings.Only show languages with existing locali: Only show languages with existing localization files
Strings.Randomize NPC Responses To Dialog Choice: Randomize NPC Responses To Dialog Choices
Strings.Refill consumables in belt slots if in i: Refill consumables in belt slots if in inventory
Strings.Show a list of NPCs that may have quest: Show a list of NPCs that may have quest objectives or other interesting features <color=yellow>(Warning: Spoilers)</color>
Strings.Show reasons you can not equip an item i: Show reasons you can not equip an item in tooltips
Strings.Some items might be invisible until loot: Some items might be invisible until looted
Strings.Some responses such as comments about yo: Some responses such as comments about your mythic powers will always choose the first one by default. This will show a copy of the answer and the condition for each possible response that an NPC might make to you based on
Strings.Speeds up or slows down the entire game: Speeds up or slows down the entire game (movement, animation, everything)
Strings.Strip HTML (colors) from Logs Tab in Uni: Strip HTML (colors) from Logs Tab in Unity Mod Manager
Strings.The following skill check adjustments ap: The following skill check adjustments apply only out of combat
Strings.This allows characters you control to mo: This allows characters you control to move through the selected category of units during combat
Strings.This allows you to adjust pitch (Camera: This allows you to adjust pitch (Camera Tilt) by holding down Mouse3 (which previously just rotated)
Strings.This also includes companions who left t: This also includes companions who left the party such as Wenduag if you picked Lann
Strings.This directly changes your character lev: This directly changes your character level but will not change exp or adjust any features associated with your character. To do a normal level up use +1 Lvl above.  This gets recalculated when you reload the game.
Strings.This hides map pins of loot containers c: This hides map pins of loot containers containing at most the selected rarity. <color=orange>Note: Changing settings requires reopening the map.</color>
Strings.This is intended for you to be able to e: This is intended for you to be able to enjoy the game while using mods that enhance your quality of life.  Please be mindful of the player community and avoid using this mod to trivialize earning prestige achievements like Sadistic Gamer. The author is in discussion with Owlcat about reducing the scope of achievement blocking to just these. Let's show them that we as players can mod and cheat responsibly.
Strings.This makes loot function like Diablo or: This makes loot function like Diablo or Borderlands. <color=orange>Note: turning this off requires you to save and reload for it to take effect.</color>
Strings.This resets all the skill check rolls fo: This resets all the skill check rolls for all interactable objects in the area
Strings.This sets your experience to match the c: This sets your experience to match the current value of character level
Strings.This turns on the developer console whic: This turns on the developer console which lets you access cheat commands, shows a FPS window (hide with F11), etc. Warning: You may need to restart the game for this to fully take effect
Strings.This will change the color of NPC names: This will change the color of NPC names on the highlight makers and change the color map markers to indicate that they have interesting or conditional interactions
This will change the color of NPC names on the highlike makers and change the color map markers to indicate that they have interesting or conditional interactions
Strings.ToyBox Archeologists can tag confusing p: ToyBox Archeologists can tag confusing puzzle pieces with green numbers in the game world and for inventory tool tips it will show text like this: [PuzzlePiece Green3x1] NOTE: Needs game restart to take efect
Strings.ToyBox can patch some critical bugs in R: ToyBox can patch some critical bugs in Rogue Trader Beta, including the following:
Strings.ToyBox has limited functionality from th: ToyBox has limited functionality from the main menu
Strings.When enabled and you hold down the camer: When enabled and you hold down the camera follow key (usually f) the camera will keep following the unit until you release it
Strings.When loading a game this will go right i: When loading a game this will go right into the game without having to 'Press any key to continue'
Strings.When ticked this shows ToyBox commands i: When ticked this shows ToyBox commands in the combat log which is helpful for you to know when you used the shortcut
Strings.You can enable hot keys to teleport memb: You can enable hot keys to teleport members of your party to your mouse cursor on Area or the Global Map
